key.name: recents-shortcut
key.summary: The shortcut used to open the recent items menu
key.description: The shortcut used to open the recent items popup menu.

key.name: case-sensitive
key.description: Set true to perform case sensitive search

key.name: file-full-path
key.description: Set true to display file full path

key.name: items-number
key.description: Set maximum number of items shown

key.name: use-icon
key.description: Set true to display an icon as indicator

key.name: label
key.description: A string used as indicator, used when Display Indicator Icon is set to false

key.name: exclude-string
key.description: A string to exclude folders or files from search and auto-purge them upon any search

key.name: show-arrow
key.description: Set true to display an arrow beside the indicator
